articles.title: Happy text 1
articles.text: Let your heart take you to wherever you want to be. And I know you're saying, 'Oh Bob, you've done it this time.' And you may be right. You can create anything that makes you happy. This is your creation - and it's just as unique and special as you are. That easy. How do you make a round circle with a square knife? That's your challenge for the day.
